text: Kalu Hima (Black Snow) () is a 2018 Sri Lankan Sinhala/Hindi bilingual drama thriller film directed by Upali Gamlath and produced by Wajira Rajapakse for Sinelka Films. It stars Niroshan Wijesinghe and Subuddi Lakmali in lead roles along with Gayani Gisanthika and Iranganie Serasinghe. Music composed by veteran musician Rohana Weerasinghe. The film has been shot completely in Nepal. It is the 1311th Sri Lankan film in the Sinhala cinema. ==Plot== Sachin, Thivanka, Vinu, Suren are four Lankan friends who go on hiking in the mountain range in Napal. Sachin is Vinu's boyfriend but in the journey Thivanka also catches Vinu's attention by being helpful. In their journey, they meet with a sudden landslide and the friends loose Sachin. Then the others go to Sri Lanka again. Then the story moves forward as Sachin is trapped in a garilla camp. A lankan lady who works in the camp talks with Sachin. Sachin relates his story to her. The story is a flashback showing how Sachin develops a relationship with a local girl called Chunda who he marries. One day they run away from Chunda's home as her brother and father protest against their relationship. Then they go to a house of Chunda's granny. One day Sachin goes to the town while Chunda's granny's house is broken apart by a flood. Then after relating the story, the lady helps Sachin to escape from the camp and eventually Sachin comes to a village where he finds Chunda. Then he decides to return to Lanka as he realizes that the garilla troops are searching for him. When he comes to Vinu's house he finds out that she has married Thivanka and she also has a daughter. The story ends as Sachin leaves Vinu's house. ==Cast== * Niroshan Wijesinghe as Sachin * Subuddi Lakmali as Chunda * Kavinga Perera as Thivanka * Tiran Wickramasuriya as Suren * Suleka Jayawardana as Vinu * Gayani Gisanthika * Iranganie Serasinghe as Chunda's granny * Harry Wimalasena * Damayanthi Fonseka ==References== ==External links== * * Kalu Hima on YouTube * අසාධාරණයට ලක් වූ සිනමාකරුවකු ලෙස මාත් අතරමං වෙලා Category:Sri Lankan films Category:2018 films Category:Sinhala-language films
